NSE top F & O gainers and losers

Source: R/nse-fo.R
nse_fo.Rd

Top futures and options gainers and losers for the last trading session.

nse_fo_top_gainers()

nse_fo_top_losers()

Value

A tibble with the following columns:

symbol

NSE ticker.

series

Equity (EQ).

last_corp_announcement_date

Last corporate announcement date.

last_corp_announcement

Last corporate announcement.

open_price

Open price.

high_price

High price.

low_price

Low price.

last_traded_price

Last traded price.

prev_close_price

Previous close price.

percent_change

Percentage change in price.

traded_quantity

Total traded quantity.

turnover

Turnover in lakhs.

Examples

# \donttest{
nse_fo_top_gainers()
#> # A tibble: 10 x 12
#>    symbol series last_corp_annou~ last_corp_annou~ open_price high_price
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <date>           <chr>                 <dbl>      <dbl>
#>  1 MFSL   EQ     2019-09-16       Annual General ~       508.       529.
#>  2 BATAI~ EQ     2019-07-22       Annual General ~      1624       1685.
#>  3 BAJAJ~ EQ     2019-07-11       Annual General ~      3167       3270 
#>  4 NMDC   EQ     2019-08-22       Annual General ~       106.       110.
#>  5 TORNT~ EQ     2019-06-13       Dividend Rs 4 P~      1882.      1941 
#>  6 MINDT~ EQ     2019-10-24       Interim Dividen~       707.       721.
#>  7 BAJAJ~ EQ     2019-07-11       Annual General ~      8975       9127.
#>  8 TCS    EQ     2019-10-17       Interim Dividen~      2028.      2062 
#>  9 ICICI~ EQ     2019-10-31       Interim Dividen~       501.       506.
#> 10 IGL    EQ     2019-09-12       Annual General ~       417.       422.
#> # ... with 6 more variables: low_price <dbl>, last_traded_price <dbl>,
#> #   prev_close_price <dbl>, percent_change <dbl>, traded_quantity <dbl>,
#> #   turnover_in_lakhs <dbl>
nse_fo_top_losers()
#> # A tibble: 10 x 12
#>    symbol series last_corp_annou~ last_corp_annou~ open_price high_price
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <date>           <chr>                 <dbl>      <dbl>
#>  1 IDEA   EQ     2019-08-16       Annual General ~        7.9       7.95
#>  2 YESBA~ EQ     2019-06-03       Annual General ~       64.1      65.2 
#>  3 JINDA~ EQ     2019-09-19       Annual General ~      159.      159.  
#>  4 PEL    EQ     2019-07-18       Annual General ~     1820      1825   
#>  5 INFRA~ EQ     2019-08-22       Interim Dividen~      270.      270.  
#>  6 ESCOR~ EQ     2019-07-11       Dividend Rs - 2~      658.      663.  
#>  7 UNION~ EQ     2019-06-20       Annual General ~       62.2      62.6 
#>  8 RECLTD EQ     2019-08-21       Annual General ~      137.      137.  
#>  9 TATAS~ EQ     2019-07-04       Annual General ~      418       419.  
#> 10 ADANI~ EQ     2019-07-26       Annual General ~      380       380   
#> # ... with 6 more variables: low_price <dbl>, last_traded_price <dbl>,
#> #   prev_close_price <dbl>, percent_change <dbl>, traded_quantity <dbl>,
#> #   turnover_in_lakhs <dbl>
# }
